column1: #Text=Jeong Jeong says : " You have healing abilities .
#Text=You have powers that I will never know .
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " Water brings healing and life .
#Text=But fire brings only destruction and pain .
#Text=It forces those of us burdened with its care to walk a razor 's edge between humanity and savagery .
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " Go get your friends and flee !
#Text=Do not come back here or you will all be destroyed .
#Text=" Zhao says : " Do n't worry , men .
#Text=My old teacher gave up fighting a long time ago .
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'm fine , we 've got to get out of here .
#Text=" Aang says : " Jeong Jeong tried to tell me that I was n't ready .
#Text=" Katara says : " You 'll have to eventually .
#Text=But right now , we have to get out here .
#Text=" Aang says : " I have to help him !
#Text=I ca n't believe my former master has become nothing more than a simple savage .
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " It is you who have embraced savagery , Zhao .
#Text=" Zhao says : " It 's Admiral Zhao , now .
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " That title will not help you against the Avatar .
#Text=" Zhao says : " I think I can handle a child .
#Text=" Jeong Jeong says : " I have never seen such raw power ... " Aang says : " Jeong Jeong !
